name: 1010! Block Fun
description:
Let’s enjoy a simple and addictive classic puzzle game!

Welcome to hottest block puzzle game.
Amuse your brain with a challenging new cube puzzle game!
Let’s enjoy a simple and addictive classic puzzle game!

How do we play?
All you have to do is move the square with your finger!
Place various types of blocks in a limited space. When you fill a row or column, all blocks in that row or column will be deleted.
Eliminating more will help you score higher!
Game will end when you have not space available for any given block.

FEATURES:
-Train your brain in leisure time.
-Completely free.
-Easy to play, but hard to master!
-No time limits.

Make up your mind to take any action. Remember to leave room for the following moves.
